title: OpenClaw’s AI ‘skill’ extensions are a security nightmare
full_text:
OpenClaw’s AI ‘skill’ extensions are a security nightmare. OpenClaw, the AI agent that has exploded in popularity over the past week, is raising new security concerns after researchers uncovered malware in hundreds of user-submitted "skill" add-ons on its marketplace. In a post on Monday, 1Password product VP Jason M….
Security researchers found hundreds of malicious add-ons on ClawHub. Security researchers found hundreds of malicious add-ons on ClawHub. by Emma RothClose P… [+3311 chars]
